bp1_yearly.4030.desc_bond_broken0:"\n\nNot only have you used trickery and charm to convince my vassal [marriage_vassal.GetTitledFirstName] to marry you and break [marriage_vassal.GetHerHis] bond with [spurned_partner.GetFirstName] — no — you've also turned [marriage_vassal.GetTitledFirstNameNoTooltip] against me!":""

bp1_yearly.4030.desc_no_broken_bonds0:"\n\nNot only have you used trickery and charm to convince my vassal [marriage_vassal.GetTitledFirstName] to marry you — no — you've also turned [marriage_vassal.GetTitledFirstNameNoTooltip] against me!":""
